"Rasta": "Okay, I'll give you the short and simple."
"You've found red containers, yes? You may have heard, but there's a lot we don't understand about them."
"Unlike the other containers, we haven't the slightest idea who placed them or for what reason..."
"Some even call them one of the seven wonders of Halpha..."
"As an engineer, I'd like to uncover those mysteries myself. We might even find something to help with our fight."
"And that's why I need your help investigating them. All you have to do is open them up and report on what's inside."
"I'll need you to check...well, as many as possible really. And only the ones in Retem count."
"Report back to me once you've gathered enough data. Good luck."
